availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jacob M. Smith (Morgan County, OH, farmer)

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Susannah Smith. Father of John Smith, Julia A. Smith, Cyrus J. Smith, Margaret Smith, Thomas Smith, Mary E. Smith, Jeremiah Smith, and Emmeline Smith. Farmer in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Penn Township, p. 143B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Penn Township, p. 428.
"Jacob M. Smith (1800-1868)," Find A Grave, Memorial #69059169, accessed October 7, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69059169/.
